New Records: Dunith Wellalage's 67 was his maiden ODI half-century
Key Match Events: The match ended in a tie as India could only manage to equal Sri Lanka's first innings score of 230
Axar c Kusal Mendis b Asalanka 33(57)
Wanindu Hasaranga c Patel b Arshdeep Singh 24(35b 1x4 2x6)
Pre-Game Insights: Wellalage speaks: Wicket - little bit turning. I knew it was turning, so I tried to play my normal game. The wicket was slow and I tried to sweep the ball and rotate the strike.
Well done, Wellalage: Dunith Wellalage has provided Sri Lanka life for a fightback
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma speaks: The score was gettable, you had to bat well to get there. We batted well in patches. No consistent momentum. We had the upper hand, we lost a couple of wicket. With the KL-Axar partnership, we came back. Little disappointing at the end. These things happened. Sri Lanka played well. In the end, it was a fair result.
